62//*****************************************************************************
63#define SDIO_Type SDIO0_Type
64#define SDHCn(n) ((SDIO_Type*)(SDIO0_BASE + (n * (SDIO1_BASE - SDIO0_BASE))))
65
66//
68//
69typedef enum
70{
71 AM_HAL_SDHC_SW_RESET_DATA_LINE = 0U,
72 AM_HAL_SDHC_SW_RESET_CMD_LINE = 1U,
73 AM_HAL_SDHC_SW_RESET_ALL = 2U
74} am_hal_sdhc_sw_reset_e;
